comments.author: Anjali @ The Picky Eater
comments.content: This was a feast for my eyes :) I'm making the Aloo Tikki tonight!

comments.author: Vegan Thyme (Kelly)
comments.content: Thank you for sharing the rest of the photos with us! I just adore your cookbook and have many "must make" post-its sticking out from the pages!

comments.author: Michelle at FoodieIsTheNewForty
comments.content: I just paged through your cookbook for the first time and there were a few recipes that I REALLY wished there had been photos for. Imagine my delight when I surfed on over to your site and found these. Brilliant! Your cookbook is a feast for the eyes and I can't wait to try some of the recipes.

comments.author: Paula Thomas
comments.content: Thanks for putting together these missing images. I'll be making one of them this weekend. :)

comments.author: Jackie
comments.content: Just ordered two copies of Herbivoracious, one for me, and one for my best friend--we treat each other to cookbooks and the leading criteria for purchase are the the pictures!  I can't wait to give it to her...THANKS!
